title: KHR_audio_graph Reverb Node (IR-based)
description: IR-based reverb using convolution. The overall effect is controlled via wet/dry mixing in the graph.

id.description: A unique identifier of the reverb node in the scene.

impulse.description: Index of the audio data to use as an impulse response.

normalize.description: Whether the impulse response should be normalized.

bypass.description: Disables this processor while still allowing unprocessed audio signals to pass.

channelInterpretation.description: Channel ordering for speaker channel interpretation are captured here.
